movies.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.Writer: Stephen King (short story "Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption"), Frank Darabont (screenplay)
movies.Actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
movies.Plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 16 nominations.

movies.Title: The Godfather
movies.Writer: Mario Puzo (screenplay), Francis Ford Coppola (screenplay), Mario Puzo (novel)
movies.Actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Richard S. Castellano
movies.Plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
